name: Uplead Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Uplead Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Uplead API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Uplead API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: company
available_options: Company (值: company) - Company API lets you lookup company data via a domain name or company name
Person (值: person) - Person API lets you lookup a person based on an email address OR based on a domain name + first name + last name

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: enrich

company.name: company
company.description: The name of the company (e.g – amazon)
company.natural_language_description: 参数名: Company | 作用: The name of the company (e.g – amazon)

domain.name: domain
domain.natural_language_description: 参数名: Domain | 作用: The domain name (e.g – salesforce.com)

email.name: email
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: Email address (e.g – mbenioff@salesforce.com)

firstname.name: firstname
firstname.description: First name of the person (e.g – Marc)
firstname.natural_language_description: 参数名: First Name | 作用: First name of the person (e.g – Marc)

lastname.name: lastname
lastname.description: Last name of the person (e.g – Benioff)
lastname.natural_language_description: 参数名: Last Name | 作用: Last name of the person (e.g – Benioff)
